type.name: org.gradle.platform.base.LibraryBinaryDependencySpec
type.description: * A dependency onto a specific binary of a library published by a project.

method.name: getLibraryName
method.description: * Returns the name of the library this dependency refers to. If null, it should be assumed that the project * defines a single library. * * @return the library name

method.name: getProjectPath
method.description: * Returns the project path of the project this dependency refers to. * * @return the project path

method.name: getVariant
method.description: * Returns the variant of this binary. * * @return the library variant

property.name: libraryName
property.description: * Returns the name of the library this dependency refers to. If null, it should be assumed that the project * defines a single library. * * @return the library name

property.name: projectPath
property.description: * Returns the project path of the project this dependency refers to. * * @return the project path

property.name: variant
property.description: * Returns the variant of this binary. * * @return the library variant
